actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to limit the period of authorization of new budget authority and to require comprehensive review and study of existing programs for which continued budget authority is proposed to be authorized by committees of the Congress.

summary.text: Prohibits the authorization of budget authority for a period of more than four years for laws enacted ofter the effective date of this Act. Limits to four years the budget authorization of existing laws which provide such authorization for a period of more than four years. Limits to six years the budget authorization of existing laws which provide such authorization for an unspecified number of years. Requires Congressional committees to conduct a comprehensive review and study of existing programs in considering legislation budget authority for such programs.

titles.title: A bill to limit the period of authorization of new budget authority and to require comprehensive review and study of existing programs for which continued budget authority is proposed to be authorized by committees of the Congress.
